song_name: Love Live Superstar - Oi Kakeru Yume No Saki De
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Love Live Superstar - Oi Kakeru Yume No Saki De is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Love Live Superstar - Oi Kakeru Yume No Saki De is written in the key of C Major.
